table_description: AWS Cost Explorer - Cost By Tags

columns.name: granularity
columns.description: The granularity for cost and usage metric data. Possible values are: DAILY|MONTHLY.

columns.name: tag_key_1
columns.description: The tag key to group by.

columns.name: tag_value_1
columns.description: The primary tag value grouped by.

columns.name: tag_key_2
columns.description: A secondary tag key to group by.

columns.name: tag_value_2
columns.description: A secondary tag value grouped by.
